item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, May 8, 2024 at 4:55 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Stormy Daniels gives graphic account of Trump encounter at criminal trial
2. Pandemic-era winners suffer $1.5tn fall in market value
3. Judge in Trump classified documents case postpones trial indefinitely
4. Taxpayers set to fund HS2 tunnel under London despite Sunak pledge
5. Apple unveils ‘outrageously powerful chip for AI’ in latest iPads
item.guid: FT Most Read: Wednesday, May 8, 2024 at 4:55 PM UTC
